main.description: A site boundary for an organization, defined by a GeoJSON shapefile

lat.description: The latitude of the centerpoint of the site

lon.description: The longitude of the centerpoint of the site

area.description: The area of the site in hectares

boundary.description: IPFS URI of the GeoJSON file defining the site boundary

trees.description: GeoJSON blob containing tree planting data for this site (max 10MB)
